price: Neka te nikako ne obmanjuje to što oni koji ne vjeruju svuda po svijetu obijesno bogatstvom raspolažu.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
